definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to use the same oil repeatedly for deep frying (a possible health hazard)

sentences.english: Return all of the chicken to the pan.
Beware of meat twice boiled, and an old foe reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 当心回锅再煮的肉，以及与你和解的老敌手。

sentences.english: Drain off the water in the pan through a strainer, and return the quinoa to the pan.
sentences.chinese: 用过滤器沥净锅里的水，再把奎奴亚藜倒回锅里。

sentences.english: Return meat to pan; toss to coat.
sentences.chinese: 将肉放回锅中，使肉的表面沾满汤汁。

sentences.english: He eats half a potato with its skin on and puts the other half back in the pot.
sentences.chinese: 他连皮吃了半个土豆，把剩下的半个又放回锅里。

sentences.english: Stir in cornflour mixture and cook until sauce thickens . Return chicken pieces to sauce. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 最后拌入生粉水埋芡，鸡件放回锅内即可品尝。

sentences.english: Try also the smoked young bamboo cold starter and twice-cooked pork.
sentences.chinese: 他们的凉菜烟笋以及回锅肉也值得品尝。

sentences.english: Drain excess fat from pan, then return the pan to heat and add the shallots .
sentences.chinese: 沥掉锅里多余的油脂，放回锅头，加热，加些青葱。

sentences.english: My father is a barbered, He's is likes noodles and cooked pork and steamed meat.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲是一个理发师，他喜欢面条和回锅肉。

definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
quick-boil/to boil for a short time
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
